backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles and movie projects with permission checks, storage maps, and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary mapping frontend file paths to brief functional descriptions for build analysis.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining prerequisites and steps for deploying the app locally and to mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes with OKLCH color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the page title and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout handling authentication, project context, workspace tabs, and global UI structure.
frontend/src/features/assembly/AssemblyP: Assembly editor providing timeline management, scene ordering, audio integration, and playback controls.
frontend/src/features/assembly/useAssemb: React hook managing playback timing and scene tracking for timeline-based or music‑video assemblies with optional audio element syncing.
frontend/src/features/assembly/useLocalA: Manages selection, URL creation, and cleanup of a locally chosen audio file.
frontend/src/features/assets/BrandLogo.t: Renders the app’s logo image and title text.
frontend/src/features/assets/RoleIcon.ts: Displays a role-specific icon by cropping from a sprite sheet based on predefined coordinates.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Shows a sign‑in/sign‑out button using Internet Identity and handles auth transitions with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Dialog for entering and saving a user’s name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCurrentUse: Combines Internet Identity state with the fetched user profile to expose current user info.
frontend/src/features/export/ExportButto: UI dropdown for exporting the current project as text or JSON with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/features/export/exportProje: Generates text or JSON exports of a project, formats sections, and triggers browser file downloads.
frontend/src/features/layout/StudioLayou: Provides the main page layout with header, footer, and content region including a publish help dialog.
frontend/src/features/projects/component: Dropdown UI for switching, creating, saving, and deleting projects with a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/features/projects/localDraf: Handles saving, loading, migrating, and clearing localStorage project drafts with versioning.
frontend/src/features/projects/useProjec: React hook managing project state, syncing anonymous drafts with backend CRUD operations and local storage. Handles creating, updating, deleting, and switching movie projects.
frontend/src/features/publish/PublishHel: UI dialog providing step-by-step instructions for deploying the app to the Internet Computer. Includes prerequisites and local deployment guidance.
frontend/src/features/workspace/componen: Panel for editing a project's outline including title, logline, characters, locations, and scenes. Supports adding, updating, and deleting outline elements.
Dialog for creating or editing role prompt entries with template support and element targeting. Manages form state and submits structured prompt data.
Board for browsing, filtering, adding, editing, deleting, and copying role-specific prompts in a project. Integrates with project state and opens the prompt editor dialog.
frontend/src/features/workspace/promptTe: Defines prompt template structures and a preset list of director, screenwriter, cinematographer, and producer prompts for project guidance.
frontend/src/features/workspace/roles.ts: Lists production roles and provides short descriptions for each role.
frontend/src/features/workspace/state/pr: Implements helper functions to create and mutate a ProjectDraft, including characters, locations, scenes, prompts, and assembly timeline reconciliation.
frontend/src/features/workspace/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for project elements such as characters, locations, prompts, timeline items, and the overall ProjectDraft.
frontend/src/features/workspace/utils/fo: Formats a role prompt into a markdown-style string for clipboard copying.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and movie projects through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s overall state, features, architecture notes, and metadata for the movie production app.
